item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德 2,000 亿美元信贷集团寻求吸引保险公司
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）新成立的信贷部门将为母公司的保险业务提供服务，该部门的首席执行官表示，该部门还将为其他保险公司提供资产监管服务。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management’s newly formed credit arm will cater to its parent’s insurance business and will also pitch other insurers on overseeing their assets, the unit’s chief executive officer says.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行研究报告详述控制货币所需的数十亿资金
item.description: 根据一份员工文件，瑞士国家银行需要花费大约 270 亿瑞士法郎（约合 300 亿美元）才能使其货币不升值 1.1%。【原文：The Swiss National Bank needs to spend roughly 27 billion francs ($30 billion) to keep its currency from appreciating 1.1%, according to a staff paper that offers a rare vignette into what officials may be thinking.】

item.title: 报告警告：今年美国房屋保险费或将创历史新高
item.description:
预计今年美国房主保险的平均保费将达到2522美元，比2023年底增长6%。佛罗里达州的保费将接近 12,000 美元。【原文：

The average premium for US homeowners insurance is expected to hit $2,522 this year, up 6% from the end of 2023. Premiums in Florida will approach $12,000.

】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。周五的通胀数据公布后，股市有望高开，黄金创下新纪录，中国市场情绪回升。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Stocks are poised for higher open after Friday’s inflation data, gold hits a new record and sentiment in China is picking up. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 土耳其建筑公司在反对党赢得大选后业绩下滑
item.description: 土耳其执政党在市政选举中遭遇史无前例的失败，使得政府支持的大型项目不太可能实现，伊斯坦布尔的建筑公司周一大幅下跌。【原文：Construction firms fell sharply in Istanbul on Monday after Turkey’s ruling party suffered an unprecedented defeat in municipal elections, making it less likely for government-backed mega projects to materialize.】

item.title: GoldenTree 为风险最高的 CLO 市场融资 13 亿美元
item.description: GoldenTree Asset Management 募集了 13 亿美元，用于投资抵押贷款债务的首亏权益档，以满足对高风险产品日益增长的需求。【原文：GoldenTree Asset Management raised $1.3 billion to invest in first-loss equity tranches of collateralized loan obligations, tapping into growing demand for higher-risk products.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦法院暂停伊姆兰-汗在一起案件中的刑期
item.description: 巴基斯坦一家法院在认定前总理伊姆兰-汗在执政期间犯有与国家礼品有关的非法交易罪两个月后，暂时中止了他 14 年的监禁。【原文：A Pakistani court temporarily suspended former Prime Minister Imran Khan’s 14-year jail sentence two months after he was found guilty of illegal dealings related to state gifts when he was in power.】

item.title: 俄罗斯计划将 4 月份柴油海运出口量降至 5 个月最低点
item.description: 在乌克兰无人机袭击炼油厂和季节性维护大幅降低原油加工率之后，俄罗斯计划将 4 月份西部主要港口的柴油日出口量降至五个月来的最低水平。【原文：Russia plans to reduce daily diesel exports from key western ports in April to the lowest in five months, after Ukrainian drone attacks on refineries and seasonal maintenance sharply lowered crude processing rates.】

item.title: 泰国重新制定施舍计划，2025 年预算赤字将扩大
item.description: 据一位高级官员透露，泰国计划提高下一财年的财政赤字预期，以刺激疲软的经济，这是迄今为止最明确的信号，表明政府正倾向于通过国家预算为一项140亿美元的现金援助计划提供资金。【原文：Thailand plans to raise the fiscal deficit estimate for next fiscal year to stimulate a sluggish economy, according to a senior official, the clearest signal yet that the government is veering toward funding a $14 billion cash handout program through the state budget.】

item.title: 高利率打击需求，巴基斯坦通胀率连续第三个月下降
item.description: 由于创纪录的借贷成本削弱了经济增长和国内需求，巴基斯坦 3 月份的通货膨胀率连续第三个月放缓。【原文：Pakistan’s inflation pace eased in March for a third month in a row as record borrowing costs weakened economic growth and domestic demand.】

item.title: 马来西亚称已掌握足够数据继续削减补贴
item.description: 马来西亚政府已收到半数以上公民的最新个人资料，这为这个东南亚国家今年开始实施期待已久的削减燃料补贴和紧缩财政的计划铺平了道路。【原文：The Malaysian government has received the updated profiles of more than half of all its citizens, paving the way for the Southeast Asian nation to proceed with its long-awaited plans to cut fuel subsidies this year and tighten its finances.】

item.title: 为什么华创城市末日循环可能仍将到来？
item.description:
城市能否抵御办公房地产的崩溃？【原文：

Can cities withstand the collapse of office real estate?

】

item.title: 香港购房者因折扣而涌向长江资产南城项目
item.description: 长江资产控股有限公司（CK Asset Holdings Ltd.）在香港的蓝色海岸（Blue Coast）项目受到买家强烈关注后，将推出更多单位出售。【原文：CK Asset Holdings Ltd. is releasing more units of its Blue Coast project in Hong Kong for sale after registering strong interest from buyers.】

item.title: 中国与印度股票相关性创历史新低
item.description: 中国和印度股票 360 天的相关性已降至有记录以来的最低水平，因为世界上最大的两个市场似乎正日益朝着相反的方向发展。【原文：The 360-day correlation between stocks in China and India has fallen to the lowest level on record, as two of the world’s largest markets increasingly appear to be going in opposite directions.】

item.title: 受假期影响，澳门三月份赌场收入超出预期
item.description: 随着全球最大赌场中心的复苏步伐加快，澳门博彩业收入在 3 月份激增，超过了分析师的预期。【原文：Macau’s gaming revenue surged in March, exceeding analyst estimates as a recovery in the world’s largest casino hub picked up speed.】

item.title: 土耳其反对党横扫地方选举后里拉下跌
item.description: 土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安（Recep Tayyip Erdogan）领导的执政党在周日举行的地方选举中大败，伊斯坦布尔和安卡拉等土耳其多个城市的控制权落入反对党手中，土耳其里拉随之走软。【原文：Turkey’s lira weakened after President Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s ruling party suffered a shock defeat at local elections on Sunday, with control of many of Turkey’s cities, including Istanbul and Ankara, going to the opposition.】

item.title: 乐天考虑合并金融部门，股价大涨
item.description: 负债累累的在线零售商乐天集团（Rakuten Group Inc.【原文：Rakuten Group Inc., the debt-laden online retailer, said it will consider combining its financial units to promote collaboration.】

item.title: 伦敦正在失去总部员工的新职位列表
item.description: 由于生活和住房成本激增，到其他地方雇人更便宜，因此英国企业正在将更多传统的总部工作岗位转移到伦敦以外的地方。【原文：UK businesses are moving more traditional head-office jobs outside of London after a surge in the cost of living and housing costs makes it cheaper to employ people elsewhere.】

item.title: 世界银行警告中国经济下滑将导致东亚经济增长放缓
item.description: 曼谷红绿灯前的摩托车手。摄影师：Chalinee Thirasupa/Bloomberg【原文：Motorcyclists at a traffic light in Bangkok. Photographer: Chalinee Thirasupa/Bloomberg】

item.title: 日本预测未来夏季和冬季电力充足
item.description: 根据日本政府的预测，日本的电力供应预计足以应付即将到来的夏季和冬季。【原文：Japan’s power supply is expected to be sufficient for both the upcoming summer and winter, according to forecasts from the government.】

item.title: 亚洲 3 月份液化天然气进口量因低价购买而跃升至创纪录水平
item.description: 在价格下跌促使新兴国家纷纷购买液化天然气之后，全球液化天然气供应正在向亚洲回流。【原文：Global liquefied natural gas supplies are shifting back to Asia after a drop in prices prompted a flurry of purchases from emerging nations.】

item.title: 日本议员称美国钢铁协议有助于应对中国风险
item.description: 日本执政党的一位资深议员表示，新日本制铁公司收购美国钢铁公司将加强美日之间的经济安全关系，并有助于对抗中国在钢铁制造领域的主导地位。【原文：Nippon Steel Corp.’s acquisition of United States Steel Corp. would strengthen economic security ties between the US and Japan and help counter China’s dominance in steel-making, according to a senior Japanese ruling party lawmaker.】

item.title: 中国顶级锂企业看淡利润下滑并誓言扩张
item.description: 中国的锂电巨头们并没有因利润下滑而气馁，他们正计划在市场上分得更大的一杯羹。【原文：Undeterred by slumping profits, China’s lithium giants are planning to grab a bigger slice of the market.】

item.title: 乐观的采购经理人指数数据增强复苏希望，中国股市上涨
item.description: 制造业活动的反弹增强了人们对中国经济复苏可能开始获得牵引力的希望，中国股市因此上扬。【原文：Chinese stocks advanced as a rebound in manufacturing activity reinforced hopes that the nation’s economic recovery may be starting to gain traction.】

item.title: 前官员称日本央行下次加息最早可能在 10 月
item.description: 日本央行的一位前官员是该国著名的通胀专家之一，他表示，日本央行可能会慢慢等待再次加息，最早可能在 10 月份加息。【原文：The Bank of Japan will probably take its time before raising interest rates again, with October likely being the earliest it might move next, according to a former BOJ official renowned as one of the nation’s leading inflation experts.】

item.title: 外资涌入印度债券市场引发市场轰动
item.description: 印度被纳入全球主要债券指数的分水岭使大量现金涌入印度，这已经在重塑这个长期以来热衷于避免热钱流入的国家的市场。【原文：Cash pouring into India from its watershed inclusion into key global bond indexes is already reshaping markets in a country long keen to insulate itself from hot money flows.】

item.title: 交易员争论印度央行是否会放松对卢比的控制
item.description: 最近人民币的波动波及卢比，引发交易员猜测印度储备银行可能面临压力，不得不放松对卢比的控制。【原文：The recent yuan volatility has spilled over to the rupee, sparking speculation among traders that the Reserve Bank of India may face pressure into loosening its firm grip over the currency.】

item.title: 中国建筑业前景黯淡，铁矿石跌至 10 个月低点
item.description: 铁矿石跌至 10 个月来的最低水平，原因是中国长达数年的房地产危机使价格持续承压，即使有更广泛的增长回升迹象。【原文：Iron ore dropped to the lowest level in 10 months as China’s years-long property crisis keeps pressure on prices even amid wider signs of a pick-up in growth.】

item.title: 瑞穗将扩大对日本小型企业并购业务的关注
item.description: 瑞穗金融集团公司（Mizuho Financial Group Inc.【原文：Mizuho Financial Group Inc. will expand its mergers and acquisitions business for small and medium-sized Japanese companies that have traditionally been under served.】

item.title: 新加坡房价第三季度逆势上涨
item.description: 新加坡房价连续第三个季度上涨，尽管几个月来销售不温不火，但市场仍避免了下跌。【原文：Singapore home prices rose for a third consecutive quarter, as the market dodged a decline despite months of tepid sales.】
